story.title: Win A Free Copy of 1Passwd
story.description: Manage all of your passwords with ease-enter to win a free copy of 1Passwd. Contest Ends April 30th.

story.title: Mac OS X Leopard may introduce Live Desktop
story.description: Apples OS X Leopard is likely to introduce the concept of a live desktop, far beyond todays use of static images. The user will be able to customize the desktop so that the desktop changes when launching different programs such as iTunes, QuickTime and so forth, if they so choose. Animations and transitions will also be introduced.

story.title: What the Mac Wears in Mac vs. PC Ads
story.description: For being such a laid back guy, the Mac in the Mac vs. PC ads dresses expensive. You too can dress like the Mac for $157.97 + sales tax.
